thread.title: Klopp tells players to be brave against Real in Champions League final

title: Klopp tells players to be brave against Real in Champions League final
text:
Klopp tells players to be brave against Real in Champions League final 10:11am BST - 01:24
Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp says his players can make light of Real Madrid's greater tournament experience by being brave against them in Saturday's Champions League final. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp says his players can make light of Real Madrid's greater tournament experience by being brave against them in Saturday's Champions League final.
